item.title: Women, youngsters, and heart health: Cardiologists call for action to combat rising heart disease trends - The Times of India
item.description:
Women, Youngsters, and Heart Health: Cardiologists Urge Action at TOI Medithon Part 2

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

At TOI Medithon Part 2, healthcare professionals gathered to emphasize the importance of heart health awareness, focusing on prevention, early diagnosis, and management of cardiovascular diseases.

  • Keynote speeches by renowned cardiologists addressed lifestyle changes and medical interventions necessary for heart health.
  • Dr. Praveen Chandra highlighted the role of lifestyle choices in heart disease prevention.
  • Stress and sleep were identified as critical factors affecting heart health.
  • Growing heart disease prevalence among younger individuals and women was a key concern.
  • Experts provided actionable insights into managing heart health through exercise, diet, and awareness.
“Most heart diseases stem from unhealthy lifestyle choices.” — Dr. Praveen Chandra
“Global data shows heart disease is advancing in women faster than in men.” — Dr. Aditya Kapoor

The event concluded with a strong call to prioritize women's heart health through education and lifestyle changes.

item.title: 'Gold must be cheaper than garlic': Rahul Gandhi visits Delhi vegetable market, says middle-class budget - The Times of India
item.description:
Gold must be cheaper than garlic: Rahul Gandhi visits Delhi vegetable market, watch video

Date: Recent
Source: Times of India

Rahul Gandhi visited a vegetable market in Delhi, drawing attention to the rising costs of essential items, emphasizing that prices of gold should be lower than that of garlic.

  • Gandhi stressed the need to make essential vegetables affordable for common people.
  • He highlighted the disparity between gold prices and vegetable prices, suggesting a ban on high markups.
  • The visit aimed to connect with voters and address rising inflation concerns.
"Gold must be cheaper than garlic," said Rahul Gandhi during his visit.

This visit reinforces Gandhi's focus on economic issues affecting everyday citizens, particularly the burden of rising prices on families.

item.title: CATL Unveils Chassis It Says Can Withstand Fires From Crashes | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
CATL Unveils Chassis It Says Can Withstand Fires From Crashes

Date: Unknown | Source: Bloomberg

Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. unveiled a new car chassis with an integrated battery designed to withstand fires or explosions from high-impact collisions.

  • The chassis can decouple from the car body and absorb energy from collisions up to 120 kms/hour.
  • Chinese EV brand Avatr is collaborating with CATL to develop cars based on this chassis.
  • The development aims to address consumer fears regarding EV battery fires.
  • CATL is expanding its offerings beyond batteries amidst slowing demand for pure-battery vehicles.
  • The company plans to roll out 1,000 battery swapping stations by the end of 2025.
The risk of EV battery fires, which are difficult to extinguish, is a detraction for some would-be buyers.

CATL's innovations aim to enhance EV adoption and reduce costs by addressing safety concerns.

item.title: NASA Warns Of Airplane-Sized Asteroid Set For Close Encounter With Earth This Week: Date, Time, Speed, Distanc - Times Now
item.description:
NASA Warns Of Airplane-Sized Asteroid Set For Close Encounter With Earth This Week

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Times Now

This week, NASA has detected a 95-foot asteroid, known as 2024 YH, which is on a trajectory that will bring it close to Earth at a safe distance of approximately 3,660,000 kilometers.

  • The asteroid will travel at a speed of 37,516 km/h.
  • Its closest approach to Earth is scheduled for 7:04 PM IST on December 26, 2024.
  • 2024 YH is not classified as a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid (PHA).
  • NASA continuously monitors near-Earth objects to assess potential risks.
“Circle December 26 on your calendars, as 2024 YH is going to be yet another celestial event to demonstrate how dynamic our universe really is.”

This close encounter presents no threat, but highlights the importance of tracking asteroid movements for Earth's safety.

item.title: Manu Bhaker Khel Ratna row: Why exception was made for Mohammed Shami last year - The Times of India
item.description:
Manu Bhaker Khel Ratna row: Why exception was made for Mohammed Shami last year

Published on: Date not available, Source: Times of India

The article discusses the recent controversy regarding the Khel Ratna award, focusing on the exceptions made for cricketer Mohammed Shami last year amid protests and discussions surrounding sports awards in India.

  • The central issue is the exception made for Shami in the Khel Ratna awards.
  • Manu Bhaker's case is contrasted with Shami's recent exception.
  • Debates around fairness and criteria used for selecting award nominees are raised.
“We are continuously evaluating how we can improve the selection process for these prestigious awards,” - an anonymous official.

This article highlights the debates and discussions surrounding sports awards in India, pointing to a need for transparency and fairness in the selection process.

item.title: Driver Of Gas Tanker That Sparked Jaipur Inferno Survived. What He Did - NDTV
item.description:
Driver of Gas Tanker Involved in Jaipur Blaze Survives and Speaks Out

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 Source: NDTV

Fourteen people have died and many more were injured in a massive blaze on the Jaipur-Ajmer highway ignited by a gas tanker accident.

  • The driver, identified as Jaiveer, escaped the fire by jumping from the tanker before a gas leak led to an explosion.
  • The accident occurred when the tanker made a U-turn and collided with a truck, causing a leak and subsequent blast.
  • Officials stated the stretch of highway is prone to accidents due to poor traffic management and construction activities.
  • Road safety experts point out hazardous conditions contributing to the accident including low visibility and inadequate signage.
  • Investigators are examining the tanker’s safety certifications and the circumstances surrounding the incident.
"The stretch of the Jaipur-Ajmer highway where the crash occurred is an accident-prone spot, with poor traffic management and ongoing construction creating hazardous conditions." - George Cheriyan, Road Safety Network

The tragic incident highlights safety concerns about road conditions and vehicle management, emphasizing the need for improved safety measures to prevent future accidents.

item.title: Asteroid alert: Massive asteroid to fly past Earth on christmas eve - News9 LIVE
item.description:
Asteroid Alert: Massive Asteroid to Fly Past Earth on Christmas Eve

Date: Today | Source: Science News

Asteroid 2024 XN1, an Amor-type near-Earth object, will approach the Earth on Christmas Eve, flying at a distance of about 7.2 million kilometers. It offers a beautiful cosmic show rather than any imminent threat.

  • The asteroid was first observed in late November 2024.
  • Its trajectory suggests an orbital cycle of 2.34 years.
  • This asteroid is relatively small, ranging from 30 to 70 meters across.
  • Amateur astronomers may get a chance to observe it in clear skies on Christmas Eve.
  • Tracking such asteroids helps improve future asteroid encounter predictions and prevention technologies.
“... the Universe presents them with a spectacle of a visitor from space who is as ephemeral as the lights themselves.”

This event serves as a reminder of the importance of space missions and our ongoing need to monitor potential asteroid threats.

item.title: iPhone 15 Flipkart sale: For just Rs 26,999– Huge discounts, exchange offers and 14-minute delivery! - ET Now
item.description:
iPhone 15 Flipkart sale: For just Rs 26,999– Huge discounts, exchange offers and 14-minute delivery!

Updated Dec 24, 2024 | Source: ET Now News

Flipkart is offering the iPhone 15 (128GB, Black) for an incredible price of Rs 26,999, down from the original price of Rs 69,990, thanks to massive discounts and exchange offers.

  • The iPhone 15 is now priced at Rs 58,499 after a 16% discount from its MRP.
  • With potential exchange savings of up to Rs 31,500, customers can buy the iPhone 15 for as low as Rs 26,999.
  • Flipkart’s delivery service promises the new iPhone within 14 minutes in select locations.
  • The iPhone 15 features Apple's Dynamic Island, a stunning 6.1-inch display, pro-level camera capabilities, a USB-C port, and is powered by the A16 Bionic chip.
"Don't miss out on this amazing deal—get your hands on the iPhone 15 for Rs 26,999 before it's gone!"

This sale presents a golden opportunity for tech lovers to grab Apple’s flagship device at an unbeatable price.

item.title: Kathy Hochul faces calls to resign after Guatemalan migrant burns woman alive, Elon Musk says ‘she should be recalled’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kathy Hochul Faces Pressure to Resign Following Tragic Subway Incident

Publication Date: Dec 24, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

New York Governor Kathy Hochul is facing calls to resign after a tragic incident involving the death of a woman at the hands of an illegal Guatemalan immigrant aboard a subway train.

  • Hochul shared a post on social media about subway safety improvements on the same day of the incident.
  • Elon Musk and Rep. Ritchie Torres criticized her for the timing of her post.
  • The suspect, Sebastian Zapeta-Calil, 33, has been charged with murder and arson.
  • Local politicians and residents are calling for Hochul's resignation, citing her insensitivity.
“You may mean well, but being governor is just not for you.” - Dov Hikind

The incident has sparked widespread outrage and discussions on public safety in New York, raising questions about Hochul's leadership.

item.title: 'Drunk Constitution writers': Manish Sisodia slams Manoj Tiwari over misleading Arvind Kejriwal video - The Times of India
item.description:
Manish Sisodia Criticizes Manoj Tiwari for Misleading Video of Arvind Kejriwal

Publication Date: Recent DateSource: News Organization

Manish Sisodia has publicly criticized Manoj Tiwari for sharing a misleading video that targets Arvind Kejriwal. The controversy highlights issues in political communication and accountability.

  • Manish Sisodia denounces a video purportedly misrepresenting Arvind Kejriwal's statements.
  • The issue raises questions about the responsibilities of political figures regarding information dissemination.
  • Sisodia's remarks aim to clarify Kejriwal's position and counter misinformation in political rhetoric.
“It is crucial for political leaders to ensure the accuracy of the information they share.”

This incident underscores the importance of truthful communication in politics, particularly in an era where misinformation can easily spread.

item.title: iPhone 15, and iPhone 15 Pro Flipkart Big Saving Days sale: Now starts at Rs 57,999 - The Indian Express
item.description:
iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro Now on Sale at Flipkart Starting at Rs 57,999

Publication Date: September 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Flipkart has announced a price reduction on the iPhone 15 and iPhone 15 Pro as part of its Big Saving Days sale, making them more accessible for buyers.

  • iPhone 15 now starts at Rs 57,999 for the 128 GB variant.
  • iPhone 15 Pro discounted to Rs 1,03,999.
  • The iPhone 15 lacks Apple Intelligence compared to the iPhone 15 Pro that features the A17 Pro chip.
  • Both models include USB-C ports and have updated features.
  • iPhone 15 Pro continues to receive updates despite being discontinued.
“The iPhone 15 is still a compelling choice for mid-range buyers, especially for everyday usage.”

This sale presents a great opportunity for customers looking to upgrade to an iPhone without spending a premium.

item.title: Beef shortage looms in Goa as traders down shutters after clash with cow vigilantes - The Indian Express
item.description:
Beef Shortage Threatens Goa as Vendors Strike After Clash with Vigilantes

Date: December 2024 Source: Indian Express

Goa faces a potential beef shortage as traders strike in response to harassment from cow vigilantes, following an altercation that left several vendors injured. The suppliers demand police protection amidst ongoing tensions.

  • Vendors went on strike protesting against the harassment following a clash with cow vigilantes in Margao.
  • Three meat vendors were injured during the incident, prompting safety concerns and a temporary halt in beef supply.
  • Vendors are urging the government to take action against vigilante groups and ensure police protection for transporting beef.
  • Goa Chief Minister Pramod Sawant emphasized the government's commitment to providing hygienic beef and warned against lawlessness.
“It is unfortunate that these vigilantes are harassing vendors while animals are transported for slaughter at the abattoir.” - Manna Bepari, President of All Goa Beef Vendors Association

This situation highlights the ongoing conflict between vendors and vigilante groups within Goa, raising concerns about food supply and safety.

item.title: Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking: 119% Jump In Ticket Sales But Far From Fighter & Bollywood Biggies Of 2024! [1 Day To Go] - Koimoi
item.description:
Baby John Box Office Day 1 Advance Booking: 119% Jump In Ticket Sales But Far From Fighter & Bollywood Bi

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Koimoi

Varun Dhawan is turning our Santa this Christmas season as he is all set to greet us with Baby John. Co-starring Keerthy Suresh, the action thriller is enjoying good hype across the nation. Advance booking sales are also showing positive signs and are growing with each passing day.

Pre-Sales for Opening Day

Baby John has registered advance booking sales of 1.22 crores, with Maharashtra contributing 19% of the total pre-sales. Nearly 40K tickets have been sold, marking a 119% increase in ticket sales in the last 24 hours.

Baby John vs top advance sales of 2024

Currently, Baby John will not make it to the top 5 advanced booking sales of 2024 due to required sales being out of reach.

  1. Pushpa 2: 91.24 crores
  2. Kalki 2898 AD: 55.30 crores
  3. Devara: 49.90 crores
  4. The GOAT – 28.90 cr gross
  5. Guntur Kaaram – 24.90 crores

The action thriller's success is heavily reliant on word-of-mouth, aiming for a solid opening.

Advance Booking At National Chains

Baby John has sold 25K tickets at major national cinema chains, and with one day left until release, it is expected to see further growth.

Note: Box office numbers based on estimates and have not been independently verified by Koimoi.

item.title: Apple to introduce Home Security with Face ID Smart Locks by 2025 - India TV News
item.description:
Apple to Introduce Home Security with Face ID Smart Locks by 2025

Publication Date: December 24, 2024
Source: India TV News

Apple is set to make a significant impact in the smart home industry by launching an innovative smart door camera integrated with Face ID technology by 2025, potentially transforming home security.

  • Face ID technology will enable secure entry for homeowners without traditional keys.
  • The smart door camera may work with existing third-party smart locks.
  • Apple aims to enhance its smart home ecosystem, which may include security cameras and a new HomePod.
  • Entering the smart home market allows Apple to diversify from plateauing iPhone sales.
  • Apple’s focus on privacy gives it a competitive edge in the smart home segment.
“With the entry into the smart home segment, Apple could redefine industry standards, combining usability, security, and privacy.”

The upcoming Face ID smart locks could signify a new era for home security and mark Apple's dominance in the smart home market.

item.title: Apple’s iPad 11 tipped for early 2025 debut with iPadOS 18.3 update: Here's what we know | Mint - Mint
item.description:
Apple’s iPad 11 Tipped for Early 2025 Debut with iPadOS 18.3 Update

Publication Date: 2023-10-27
Source: 9to5Mac

Apple is expected to launch the iPad 11 in early 2025, coinciding with the rollout of the iPadOS 18.3 update. This upcoming model may feature Apple's latest chipset and support for 5G connectivity.

  • The iPad 11 is rumored to launch alongside the iPadOS 18.3 update.
  • The typical release for this update is in January.
  • Alternative reports suggest a potential Spring 2025 launch.
  • The iPad 11 may include support for 5G and Wi-Fi connectivity.
  • It is expected to be powered by the A17 Pro chipset.
  • This new model might be the most affordable device to support Apple Intelligence features.
“Apple's new iPad model will launch sometime early next year, whether it is January or March remains to be seen.”

In conclusion, Apple enthusiasts can look forward to the iPad 11's anticipated features and release timeline in early 2025.

item.title: "Cheap Trolls": Manish Sisodia vs Manoj Tiwari Over Arvind Kejriwal Video - NDTV
item.description:
Have Some Shame: Manish Sisodia Vs Manoj Tiwari Over Arvind Kejriwal Video

Date: December 24, 2024
Source: NDTV

The recent altercation between AAP leader Manish Sisodia and BJP MP Manoj Tiwari has escalated following Tiwari's sharing of a misleading video clip of Arvind Kejriwal, which led to strong responses from Sisodia.

  • Manoj Tiwari shared a 9-second clip of Kejriwal's remarks regarding the Constitution on X.
  • Sisodia countered by sharing the full context of Kejriwal's statements from a 12-year-old video.
  • Tiwari accused Kejriwal of implying that the drafters of the Constitution were intoxicated.
  • Multiple users have faced legal issues for circulating the clipped video.
  • The dispute arose amid ongoing controversies surrounding statements made by Amit Shah about BR Ambedkar.
"You are tweeting lies. If not yourself, at least respect the post of an MP." — Manish Sisodia

The exchange has drawn significant attention, as Tiwari and Sisodia debate the implications of their statements related to the Constitution.

item.title: Tata Group stocks Tata Investment, Tata Motors surge up to 12% amid Tata Capital IPO buzz | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Tata Group Stocks Surge Amid IPO Buzz for Tata Capital

Date: December 24, 2023 | Source: Live Mint

Several Tata Group stocks, including Tata Investment Corporation, Tata Technologies, and Tata Motors, saw significant gains due to reports of a forthcoming IPO for Tata Capital.

  • Tata Investment Corporation shares surged up to 12%
  • Tata Technologies increased by 4%
  • Tata Chemicals rose 3%, Tata Motors up by 2% and TCS by 1%
  • The IPO is anticipated to exceed ₹15,000 crore
  • Tata Capital must adhere to RBI's directive for mandatory listing by September 2025
"Work has begun on the proposed initial public offer. This is to comply with RBI's norms for 'upper layer' NBFCs." - Moneycontrol source

The Tata Group is moving ahead with plans for Tata Capital's IPO potentially influenced by RBI regulations, aiming for compliance within stipulated timelines.

item.title: Yemen faces a cholera crisis; Arabian Peninsula country accounted for 35% of global cholera cases as of December 1: WHO - Down To Earth Magazine
item.description:
Yemen faces a cholera crisis; Arabian Peninsula country accounted for 35% of global cholera cases as of December 1: WHO

Published on: 24 Dec 2024, 4:51 am

War-torn Yemen is suffering from a cholera epidemic, now accounting for a significant share of global cases and deaths as reported by the WHO.

  • Nearly 250,000 suspected cholera cases reported in Yemen.
  • 861 related deaths occurred as of December 1, 2024.
  • Yemen accounts for 35% of worldwide cholera cases and 18% of related deaths this year.
  • Inadequate access to clean water and poor sanitation exacerbates the crisis.
  • Yemen’s cholera response faces a $20 million funding gap.
  • Closure of treatment centers due to lack of funds, risking a repeat of past outbreaks.
  • 18.2 million people, nearly half of Yemen's population, require humanitarian assistance.
“The outbreak of waterborne diseases like cholera and acute watery diarrhoea imposes an additional burden on an already stressed health system facing multiple disease outbreaks.” - Arturo Pesigan, WHO Representative in Yemen

Immediate financial support is critical to prevent a worsening of the cholera outbreak in Yemen, which is already suffering from a long-standing humanitarian crisis.

item.title: Oppo Reno 13 Pro, Reno 13 to launch in India next month: Here’s what the smartphones will offer - The Times of India
item.description:
Oppo Reno 13 Pro, Reno 13 to launch in India next month: Here’s what the smartphones will offer

Date: Next Month Source: Oppo Announcement

The Oppo Reno 13 Pro and Reno 13 are scheduled for launch in India next month, promising exciting new features for users.

  • Launch expected next month.
  • Enhancements in camera technology.
  • Improved battery life and performance specifications.
  • Competitive pricing aimed at high-end smartphone market.
“Oppo aims to set new benchmarks in the smartphone market with the upcoming Reno series.”

These new models highlight Oppo's continuous innovation and commitment to providing advanced features that cater to user demands.

item.title: Amid Manali’s traffic nightmare, Himachal’s snow-covered serenity steals spotlight in viral videos - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Himachal Pradesh's Snowy Beauty Goes Viral Despite Manali Traffic Chaos

Date: December 24, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

A recent snowfall in Himachal Pradesh has created both traffic jams in Manali and viral videos showcasing the region's winter beauty. While nearly 1,000 vehicles were stranded, videos of the serene snow-covered landscapes captivated social media users.

  • A fresh snowfall led to traffic struggles with 1,000 cars stuck between Solang and Atal Tunnel.
  • The snowfall transformed Himachal Pradesh into picturesque winter scenes, leading to viral videos online.
  • Videos depict the calming beauty of snow-covered mountains, attracting positive reactions.
  • Other regions like Shimla received snowfall as well, with historical context regarding snowfall patterns shared by meteorological officials.
  • Expectations include more snowfall in isolated areas over the upcoming days.
“Snow-capped mountains look beautiful” – A social media user expresses the beauty of the snowfall in a viral video.

The recent snowfall not only signifies winter beauty but also highlights the challenges of travel in popular tourist destinations.

item.title: 'Modern-day great Virat Kohli will figure it out' - Rohit Sharma - The Times of India
item.description:
'Modern-day great Virat Kohli will figure it out' - Rohit Sharma

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

As India and Australia prepare for the fourth Test of the Border Gavaskar Trophy, Kohli's inconsistent performance is under scrutiny. Captain Rohit Sharma expresses confidence in Kohli, stating he believes Kohli will regain his form.

  • Kohli has scored 126 runs in five Test innings during the series, with an average of 31.50.
  • Rohit Sharma, despite his own struggles, remains optimistic about Kohli’s ability to turn things around.
  • Rohit commented on modern-day greats like Kohli saying they will find their own path to success.
  • The team dynamics have shifted, with Rohit batting in the middle order, affecting his performance.
  • Rohit has insisted on keeping the team's batting order strategy private.
"Modern-day greats will figure out their own way of (carving out their) path." - Rohit Sharma

In summary, while Kohli's form has been a concern, Rohit Sharma's confidence in his ability to bounce back is a reassuring message for fans as India looks to make a mark in the ongoing series against Australia.
